text: Gonne ka dinako tse dingwe Modimo o dirisa bofutsana mo matshelong a rona go re thusa go ikwatlhaela sebe le go batla botshelo jo bosakhutleng. Re se ka ra utlwa botlhoko ka go bo romela ga one. Mme bohutsana jwa motho yo o seng Mokeresete ga se bohutsana jwa boikwatlhao jwa boammaaruri ebile ga bo kake jwa kganela loso lo lo sa khutleng.
